::Battera::

SHe looked at CyberShark. "Please stay." she walked over to him and 
took his hand in hers. She looked at him with caring in her eyes.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> 
> Octociz and Brix
> 
> Octociz/Brix looked back at the bot, and it seemed all was lost. 
The 
> chances of finding a pod was unlikely.
> 
> "Fine, go ahead and try it. Thank you for your help. It seems 
thought 
> that my spark will have to go out. Let's just pray to The Matrix 
that 
> a pod has crashed unknowingly."
> 
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois sat down in the discussion room along with his friends. He 
> began to tell them his tale.
> 
> "After Terminess and I blew ourselves up, I expected to awaken 
inside 
> The Matrix, not infront of it. It started speaking to me, saying 
that 
> it wanted me to bring Organic life to Cybertron. It said I would 
> return to Past Earth and attempt to unify those bots in bringing 
back 
> Organic life so that all bots could an organic form. With the 
sharing 
> of this, it would bring everyone closer to peace. I was suppost to 
> bring three chosen ones to aide me:Cybershark, Soundwave and 
Battera. 
> The Matrix also explained that it was the reason I came to the Neo 
> Beast Wars in the first place, so that I could see how terrible 
> Predacon life was. So it returned me to Past Earth, where I have 
> spent the last two weeks hiding, building this place. Scraps of 
pods, 
> ships and other materials. Since everyone thought I was dead, no 
one 
> bothered to try and notice this area. So, now you know my story, 
and 
> the mission we are all entrusted with. Now, The Matrix warned that 
we 
> may not succeed; some might even get mad at our attempts of peace 
and 
> may try to attack us. It also warned me that you may not want to 
> join, especially you Cybershark, who is such a warrior. So I ask 
you 
> now before we take the first step. This is your only chance to 
leave. 
> Do you want to join me, or go back on your way?"
